sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Glyphs (created with drawing table)
Machines now accept Thermal Foundation's Essence of Knowledge
Magnets now have configurable whitelists

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Add tint to fluids in tanks (fixes TiC fluids)
Fix potential crash when rendering sprinkler outside of world
Fix skyblock drops
Fix off-hand usage of few items
Add missing recipe for big wooden button
Fix shower XP dupe
Fix blocks sometimes dropping when placed with magnet
Improvements to sky block rendering speed
Fix guide book recipe rendering

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Tanks can now be drained without sneaking
Skyblocks are now disabled only when Optifine shaders are enabled

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Fixed flickering leaves after rendering snowman trophy
Fix rare startup crash with FoamFix

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Added wooden big button (works like vanilla)
Extended big button inventory size
Display size of stack contained in /dev/null/
Canvas blocks now mimic material and sounds. Also, fixes connection to fences

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Fix item duplication with dropper
Fix draining fluids from tank with bucket
Fix translation names for entities
Fix incorrect spawn position of cartographer, magnet, golden eye
Fix luggage item search
Fix rendering of some custom models in /dev/null
Fix dummy contents of custom recipes
Fix block shapes (fence connectivity now works correctly)

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Changed paintbrush model to fix flickering
Paintbrush tries to recolor block before replacing with canvas
Skyblocks rendering disabled by default when Optifine is detected
Sponge no longer updates liquid blocks (configurable)

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Fix paint mixer tone slider
Fix some crashes with client-side HUD display mods
Limit block placer and breaker updates per tick

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Lower default sonic glasses opacity
Deployed gliders are now still visible in GUI
Block breaker now selects correct tool (allows breaking snow, webs, etc)

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Port to 1.12.2
Any block can be configured as elevator (see 'dropblock.overrides' in config)

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Fix server slowdown when using block placer
Change big metal bar recipe to prevent conflicts
Fix random glitches and crashes

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Auto-anvil now accepts any items in both input slots

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Fix startup crash due to interaction with certain mod
Fix building guide texture orientation

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Re-implement rendering of few blocks with block models
Golden eye now stores last selected target

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Port to MC 1.11.2
Right clicking on fan will rotate it (same as flag)
Added new trophies

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Fixed Sky Block rendering behind glass
Fix couple of custom recipes
Fix off-hand glider behaviour
Fix flag placing and dropping
Grave can now be safely disabled

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Item placer now tries to place item on inventory change
Flags with different colors no longer stack

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Port to 1.10.2
Canvas now handles non-cube shapes
Golden Eye is now more verbose
Speed of items from item dropper can now be controlled

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Items not rendering in /dev/null
Sky Block rendering order

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Improve building guide rendering
More realistic hang glider mechanics
Vertical speed indication for hang-glider (variometer)

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Last Stand takes into account armor damage reduction
Block placers now properly orient placed blocks
XP shower no longer ignores redstone after game restart
/dev/null and sprinkler item duplications
Graves no longer spawn in bedrock layer (configurable)

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Fancify map projector
This book now has page numbers in Table of Contents
Builder guide dome shape rotated to allow more orientations

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Blocks with internal tanks ignoring neighbouring tanks after reload
XP shower popping after block update

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Improve building guide
Add building guide that can place blocks
Rotating elevator
Way to remove lore from items
Wrench-thingie for rotating blocks

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Cannon aiming fixed
Rope ladders now drops items
Blocks check redstone state after placing

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: /dev/null/ GUI opens only when player is sneaking
elevators no longer centers players

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Crayon block not cannot be broken in adventure mode
Vacuum hopper fluid bar not updating
Bear trap holds entities between restarts
Luggages keep their enchantments
Flim-flam now has blacklist/whitelist switch

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Flim-flam now has blacklist/whitelist switch

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Paintbrush can now dye vanilla blocks (like wool)
Paintbrush can now be dyed in crafting inventory
Paintbrushes from few other mods should now work with canvas blocks
Added vanilla color selector to paint mixer

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Decreased lag when using canvas, imaginary, sky blocks, etc.
Change blocks breaker timing to prevent item duplicating

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Scaffolding - will decay after some time
Option to disable picking blocks and/or mobs with magnet

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Magnets tries to check if block can be removed/placed
Block breaker can now push to BC pipes

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Elevators don't drain XP by default, amount can be configured

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Tank crash during breaking
Fluid level not rendered properly in tank item
Crash when updating huge surfaces made of skyblocks
Rendering glitch caused by stacking /dev/null/
Some methods in OpenPeripheral adapters for donation station and projector not working
Should not crash when other mod registers liquid XP

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: XP <-> fluid conversion rates are now configurable
Added separate option to ignore blocks between elevators

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Few blocks (guide, paint mixer) now store settings as items
Graves now replay death cause when right clicked
Graves can now spawn dirt block when in air
Graves can be named as items
Right clicking grave with shovel drops items without destroying
This book now have keyboard controls

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Tanks should render much faster now
This book crashing in some weird configurations
Graves not spawning after player died in void
Sprinklers visual glitches
Objects picked by magnets now have proper collision boxes

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Sleeping bags don't prevent players from sleeping in tall grass
Graves are not available in creative inventory

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Port to Minecraft 1.7.10
Elevators are now plain blocks
Tanks distribute liquids when filled as item
Filled tanks available in creative inventory search
Bear traps can now be opened with redstone
Grave contents are now stored and can be restored with /ob_inventory
Building guide is now controlled by redstone

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Graves not spawning after explosion
Added luggage to MFR autospawner blacklist
This book can now be disabled
Sleeping bags sometimes dropping player through blocks
Block breaker now correctly captures all drops
Objects picked by magnets now have proper collision boxes

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: /dev/null
Most block can now be rotated with tools
Very simple pedometer
on_inventory command to store and restore players inventory
Using dye on guide block now changes markers color
Sponge-on-a-stick
Tiny People

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Trophy drops now enchantment sensitive, don't drop from non-player kill
Reduced tank lag
Yet another XP duplication bug
Cartographer now ignores Natura clouds

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: XP Shower

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Skyblock render glitches
Last Stand ballancing

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Graves now have obsidian-level blast resistance

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Added the new 'sky' block
Added the 'flim flam' enchantment
Added the 'last stand' enchantment

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Block placers and breakers were sometimes derping. Now underped
Cartographers were on strike. We've increased their salary and service has resumed

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Radio volume can now be controlled via redstone
Fan strength can now be controlled via redstone
Radio now accepts with URLs pointing to PLS and M3U files and understands HTTP redirections
Removed the 'raspberry ripple' from the building guide
Target now registers shots from flans guns

sections.title: openblocks.gui.features
lines: Almighty Book!
Radios and radio villagers added!
Middle clicking on tank with any liquid gives item with full amount
Proper building guide localization
Other mods block breakers now pick all dropped items
Cannon pointer no longer resets after single click
Blacklist for blocks that should be ignored by cartographer
disableMobs blacklist now accepts mod names too
Way to specify special block rules for elevator

sections.title: openblocks.gui.bugfixes
lines: Target dropping arrow shot by infinity bow
Squids spawning water in nether
Sprinkler animation sometimes halts
Missing drops from canvas
Trophy resetting type after breaking with any block breaker
Invalid sponge step sound
Cannon not able to target in certain directions
Luggage trying to pick item even with full inventory
Block placer using whole stack instead of single item
Elevator not working when high level jump boost/other jump helpers are used
Color formatting in paint mixer GUI
Trophy flickering when placed in creative

sections.title: openblocks.gui.tweaks
lines: Enderman trophies now shoot enderpearls instead of teleporting directly
